Robert Earl Sawyer https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Earl_Sawyer 0 Robert Earl Sawyer (June 5, 1923 – November 11, 1994) was an African-American playwright, director and actor. Robert_Earl_Sawyer ( June_5_,_1923 – November_11_,_1994 ) was an_African-American_playwright , director_and_actor .
